author: ceki
msg: The dispatcher thread associated with AsyncAppender is now marked
as a deamon thread. This resolves bug #9750.

author: mwomack
msg: Updated to include log4j.filters in jar file and javadocs.

author: mwomack
msg: Added MatchFilterBase class to log4j.filters package and three subclasses to match specific things: LevelMatchFilter, MDCMatchFilter, and NDCMatchFilter.  LevelMatchFilter and NDCMatchFilter are versions moved from the varia package, but changed to subclass from MatchFilterBase.
